blockr.core: A block-based framework for data manipulation and visualization

Source: R/pkg.R
blockr.core-package.Rd

A framework for data manipulation and visualization using a web-based point and click user interface.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/BristolMyersSquibb/blockr.core/issues
